SEARCH
Package net.minecraftforge.common

Class EventBusMigrationHelper

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.common.EventBusMigrationHelper
public final class EventBusMigrationHelper extends Object
A small helper class to aid Forge modders in migrating from EventBus 6 to the new EventBus 7.
Refer to the migration guide mentioned in the Forge 1.21.6 announcement or ask in the Forge Discord for help with migrating your mod to the new system.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public Collection<net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.listener.EventListener> register(Class<?> clazz)
      A version of BusGroup.register(Lookup, Class) that doesn't require a lookup. It is strongly recommended to use the BusGroup method directly with MethodHandles.lookup() as the first argument, as this migration helper method relies on JDK internals that may break without notice.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class containing static event listener methods that you want to register.
      Returns:
      a collection of EventListener instances that were registered, can be passed to BusGroup.unregister(Collection) to unregister them later.
      See Also:
      • BusGroup.register(Lookup, Class)

    • register

      public Collection<net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.listener.EventListener> register(Object instance)
      A version of BusGroup.register(Lookup, Object) that doesn't require a lookup. It is strongly recommended to use the BusGroup method directly with MethodHandles.lookup() as the first argument, as this migration helper method relies on JDK internals that may break without notice.
      Parameters:
      instance - the instance of a class containing instance and static event listener methods that you want to register.
      Returns:
      a collection of EventListener instances that were registered, can be passed to BusGroup.unregister(Collection) to unregister them later.
      See Also:
      • BusGroup.register(Lookup, Object)

    • name

      public String name()
      The unique name of this BusGroup.

    • register

      public Collection<net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.listener.EventListener> register(MethodHandles.Lookup callerLookup, Class<?> utilityClassWithStaticListeners)
      Registers all static methods annotated with SubscribeEvent in the given class.
      Parameters:
      callerLookup - MethodHandles.lookup() from the class containing listeners
      utilityClassWithStaticListeners - the class containing the static listeners
      Returns:
      A collection of the registered listeners, which can be used to optionally unregister them later

    • register

      public Collection<net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.listener.EventListener> register(MethodHandles.Lookup callerLookup, Object listener)
      Registers all methods annotated with SubscribeEvent in the given object.
      Parameters:
      callerLookup - MethodHandles.lookup() from the class containing the listeners
      listener - the object containing the static and/or instance listeners
      Returns:
      A collection of the registered listeners, which can be used to optionally unregister them later

    • unregister

      public void unregister(Collection<net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.listener.EventListener> listeners)
      Unregisters the given listeners from this BusGroup.
      Parameters:
      listeners - A collection of listeners to unregister, obtained from register(Class) or register(Object) register(MethodHandles.Lookup, Class) or register(MethodHandles.Lookup, Object)
